content: this pattern is close to my heart as i designed it for my uncle s wife s 50th birthday as a unique gift i wanted to make something quick yet beautifully textured and elegant she loves yellow and red shades so the yarn cake i had in my stash was perfect for it enjoy my newest design the ***raiwë shawl*** which is quite easy and **fast to make** the pattern is free on my blog ** here 1 ** or if you click on visit pattern website above also you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee it is available to download as a ***photo tutorial*** and it has a print friendly version too **difficulty ** intermediate/advanced **size ** 150 cm/59 long and 44 cm/17 5 wide after blocking **gauge ** 5 double_crochet stitches = 1 / 2 5cm **blocking is essential to enhance the lace patternwork of your shawl and to ensure that your edges are straight ** **us terms** used throughout **no chart available** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2021/05/11/raiwe-shawl/
